description: The file defines a React functional component named TaskList, which renders a list of TaskItem components based on provided tasks. It manages task entry and exit animations using React hooks, and displays a placeholder UI when there are no tasks.

methods.name: TaskList({ tasks, onToggle, onDelete, onUpdate })
methods.description: A React component that displays a list of tasks with enter/exit animations and empty state handling.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Handles deletion of a task, including triggering exit animation and invoking external onDelete callback.

ctags.name: TaskList
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TaskList({ tasks, onToggle, onDelete, onUpdate }) {$/
